title: Names of victims in nightclub shooting released
content:
DES MOINES, Iowa —
The Polk County Sheriff's Office released more information Tuesday in a nightclub shooting from last weekend.
Authorities identified the Evolution Nightclub victims as Geraldine Y. Lindsey, 25, of Illinois; Marquise J. Thompson, 19, of Des Moines; and Steve A. Gibbs, 33, of Des Moines. All three are listed in fair condition as of Tuesday.
The shooting happened on Nov. 8.
Dashawn E. Smith was shot around 2 a.m. and was taken to a hospital, where he died.
Authorities said there were several hundred people in and around the club when the shooting occurred. Polk County detectives continue to investigate the case and are interviewing witnesses.
Anyone with information on the case should call Polk County Crime Stoppers at 515-223-1400 or at www.polkcountycrimestoppers.org
